text: You are welcome to use the services provided by stacked paper games, including your interaction behavior with stacked paper games and products or services that you register and use stacking games (hereinafter collectively referred to as "service").

Paper game attaches great importance to the personal information and privacy protection of users. This "Privacy Policy" has been formulated to you that when you use our products or services, how can we collect, use, store and share, and transfer these information.And the way we provide access, update, control and protect these information.

We recommend that you read this "Privacy Policy" carefully, especially the clauses that are marked with rough characters, and make a proper choice in accordance with the guidance of this "Privacy Policy".
If you do not agree with any content of this "Privacy Policy", we will not be able to provide you with services or to achieve the service effect we are going to achieve.

We need to remind you in particular: Because there are many types of game products and services, the contents of the services you provide are different, so core business functions (including the types of your personal information) will also be different.The actual product or service is prevailing.

You understand and agree that we want to provide you with a perfect product or service, so we may revise this "Privacy Policy" from the situation of relevant laws and regulations or business adjustments from time to time. When the terms of this "Privacy Policy" occurAt the time of changes, we will prompt you to prompt you to remind you of the content of the change through the page prompts, pop -ups, announcements, etc. After the version is updated.

Important
rewrite: After the version is updated, we will prompt the content of the terms of the "Privacy Policy" through page prompts, pop -ups, announcements, etc.
